publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Two hundred leagues further north
Two hundred leagues further north

sense.def: in the north; from the north; towards the north, northwards 北面

tls:text.tls:line: Two hundred leagues further north
is a mountain called Mount Showdove.
is a mountain called Mount Showdove.

sense.def: turtledove; name of various kinds of birds

tls:text.tls:line: Dye mulberry trees are numerous on its summit.
Dye mulberry trees are numerous on its summit.

sense.def: the upper side of; upon, on 泰山之上

tls:text.tls:line: Dye mulberry trees are numerous on its summit.

sense.def: have much; have many; contain many 多金

tls:text.tls:line: Dye mulberry trees are numerous on its summit.

sense.def: kind of tree suitable for use in silk-worm cultivation, like a mulberry tree, but also useful in the production of yellow pigment as a symbol of imperial authority

tls:text.tls:line: There is a bird on this mountain

sense.def: the general word for any kind of bird

tls:text.tls:line: There is a bird on this mountain

sense.def: like 於之: in it, from it, to him etc.

tls:text.tls:line: which looks like a crow,
which looks like a crow,

sense.def: (dynamic) shape and pose; physical constitution, physical build

tls:text.tls:line: which looks like a crow,

sense.def: 魯德如邾 be like that of

tls:text.tls:line: which looks like a crow,
but it has markings on its head and it has a white beak and scarlet feet.
but it has markings on its head and it has a white beak and scarlet feet.
but it has markings on its head and it has a white beak and scarlet feet.
Its name is the sprite Guard.
Its name is the sprite Guard.
Its name is the sprite Guard.
When it sings, it calls itself: 'Jing-wey.'
When it sings, it calls itself: 'Jing-wey.'
When it sings, it calls itself: 'Jing-wey.'

sense.def: call oneself by one's own name

seg.line: 是炎帝之少女，名曰女娃，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是炎帝之少女，名曰女娃，
tls:text.tls:line: This is the great god Flame's youngest daughter. Her name is Girl Lovely.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是炎帝之少女，名曰女娃，
tls:text.tls:line: This is the great god Flame's youngest daughter. Her name is Girl Lovely.

sense.def: of young age; (in office designations) junior; of younger age

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是炎帝之少女，名曰女娃，
tls:text.tls:line: This is the great god Flame's youngest daughter. Her name is Girl Lovely.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是炎帝之少女，名曰女娃，
tls:text.tls:line: This is the great god Flame's youngest daughter. Her name is Girl Lovely.
Girl Lovely was sporting in the East Sea
Girl Lovely was sporting in the East Sea
when she drowned and did not come back.
when she drowned and did not come back.
That is why she became the Sprite Guard.
That is why she became the Sprite Guard.
For eternity whe carries wood and pebbles in her beak from the West Sea (read: MOUNTAIN)

sense.def: regularly; invariably; in perpetuity; permanently, constantly

tls:line.title: 山海經 (en) Translation of 山海經 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: For eternity whe carries wood and pebbles in her beak from the West Sea (read: MOUNTAIN) For eternity she carries wood and pebbles in her beak from the West Sea (read: MOUNTAIN)

sense.def: hold an object in the mouth so that part of it remains visible, hence: harbour inside one (mostly negative sentiments), harbour resentment

tls:line.title: 山海經 (en) Translation of 山海經 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: For eternity whe carries wood and pebbles in her beak from the West Sea (read: MOUNTAIN) For eternity she carries wood and pebbles in her beak from the West Sea (read: MOUNTAIN)

sense.def: piece of timber, piece of wood

tls:text.tls:line: in order to dam up the East Sea.

tls:line.title: 山海經 (en) Translation of 山海經 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The River brocade rises here The River Brocade rises here

tls:line.title: 山海經 (en) Translation of 山海經 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The River brocade rises here The River Brocade rises here

tls:line.title: 山海經 (en) Translation of 山海經 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The River brocade rises here The River Brocade rises here

sense.def: like 於之: in it, from it, to him etc.

tls:text.tls:line: When he got thirsty he wanted to get something to drink.
When he got thirsty he wanted to get something to drink.

sense.def: manage to get, obtain; get hold of, find (what one is looking for); manage to find (one's proper place)

tls:text.tls:line: He drank at the Yellow River and at the River Wèi,
but the Yellow River and the Wèi he found insufficient.

sense.def: 甚足be sufficient; be satisfactory; be well supplied; (e.g. of words:) be sufficient for the occasion; be sufficiently qualified

tls:text.tls:line: In the north he went to drink from the Grand Marshlands.
In the north he went to drink from the Grand Marshlands.
But before he got there
But before he got there

sense.def: reach as far as the contextually determinate object; get to the contextually determinate object

tls:text.tls:line: on the way, as he was dying of thirst.
on the way, as he was dying of thirst.
on the way, as he was dying of thirst.
he threw away his walking stick
he threw away his walking stick

sense.def: Western dialects, acc. FANGYAN: shield to cover whole body

tls:text.tls:line: The Sovereign cut off the other's head

sense.def: cut off; cut up; mutilate; cut down

tls:text.tls:line: The Sovereign cut off the other's head
Xíng Tiān and the Sovereign reached this place and fought over who was more supernaturally talented.
Xíng Tiān and the Sovereign reached this place and fought over who was more supernaturally talented.
Xíng Tiān and the Sovereign reached this place and fought over who was more supernaturally talented.

sense.def: compete over who excels most in Nab

tls:text.tls:line: Xíng Tiān and the Sovereign reached this place and fought over who was more supernaturally talented.
Xíng Tiān and the Sovereign reached this place and fought over who was more supernaturally talented.

sense.def: supernatural power, supernatural efficiency (mostly so in XUN as a technical term)

tls:text.tls:line: Xíng Tiān and the Sovereign reached this place and fought over who was more supernaturally talented.
